divs: Sighting Detailsabout 9 pm tonight (1-31-12) my husband and i went outside or a cigarette. i always watch the sky on clear nights. i noticed this brighter than normal star around the tree line, and as i'm looking at it, i was thinking, ok, that's not an airplane becuase there were about 3 of them in the sky. it was a yellowish-white ball of fire. Ive seen it up in the sky before, but nothing ever happened before. but tonite was when the thing started to move and i moved to watch it through the trees. i thought, ok, this could be a satalite, but then as it moved, it started to move faster and then it disappeared, i moved all over to see if i could see it again through the trees, but it was gone. I know that satelites don't just disapear. i know that it wasn't an airplane and i know it wasn't a "shooting star", i know what they all looked like. I may be starting to second guess myself as this was the first time ive ever seen this.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fountain Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
